alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Jackson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 7:14PM MDT until May 27 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Haakon County in west central South Dakota... Northeastern Jackson County in southwestern South Dakota... * Until 800 PM MDT. * At 714 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles north of Ottumwa to 7 miles northwest of Belvidere, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Haakon and northeastern Jackson Counties. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 156 and 174. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
